about_the_game:
Tank Team, the ultimate game of cooperation, coordination and most importantly: communication.

Assemble a team of up to 8 players (recommended 2 minimum) and operate your tank by doing tasks, such as rotating the barrel, loading the shells, setting the power and pressing FIRE!

However, only one member of your team can see outside the tank at a time, so you're going to need precise communication to land your shots...

The last team standing, wins!

Free Version
  • Host and join lobbies
  • Play the default premade maps
  • Experience the core of the game

If you'd like to help support the development of the game and get the full Tank Team experience, you can purchase the "Full Version" DLC!

Full Version
  • Unlock cool cosmetics
  • Earn currency by playing games
  • Use the level editor to create custom maps
  • As a host, you can play custom Workshop maps

And don't forget: Teamwork makes the tank work!
detailed_description:
Tank Team, the ultimate game of cooperation, coordination and most importantly: communication.

Assemble a team of up to 8 players (recommended 2 minimum) and operate your tank by doing tasks, such as rotating the barrel, loading the shells, setting the power and pressing FIRE!

However, only one member of your team can see outside the tank at a time, so you're going to need precise communication to land your shots...

The last team standing, wins!

Free Version
  • Host and join lobbies
  • Play the default premade maps
  • Experience the core of the game

If you'd like to help support the development of the game and get the full Tank Team experience, you can purchase the "Full Version" DLC!

Full Version
  • Unlock cool cosmetics
  • Earn currency by playing games
  • Use the level editor to create custom maps
  • As a host, you can play custom Workshop maps

And don't forget: Teamwork makes the tank work!

name: Tank Team

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 3.1GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX650
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A team based PVP game where groups of up to 8 players must work together to operate a tank!
supported_languages: English, French, Dutch, Polish, Swedish, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Turkish, Vietnamese, German, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Arabic, Russian, Czech, Japanese
